title: DJ Sona
body: Im not sure if this was mentioned or not but when if you read the description of the skin it says that allies should be able to hear the music Sona plays, but in all the games i play with her i never hear anything different then the other skins, i dont mind it not being there but if its suppose to be there and its not im pretty sure something is wrong

replies.body: you have to press tab than look at her character portrait, and you will see a music note. Click that to turn it on and off.
Yup! Make sure you're not looking at the portrait on the scorecard, but instead on the one that shows you if allies' ults are ready. :]
I only ever hear the same song on my client... like does she have more than one? I don't know if its a bug or not or if I'm just stupid.

A lot of my friends have trouble finding it too. You have to hold tab, while still holding tab look at the pictures of your teammates to the left ( the far left of your screen, not the far left of the tab screen you just opened) there will be a box there for you to click. As far as the song not changing, that's up to the sona. She can change the song with /toggle but a lot of sonas are just picking one song and running it all game. I like to switch it with the phases personally :)
Again...that doesn't work for some of us.  Been in a game with DJ Sona probably a dozen times across all my accounts...not once does the "note" ever appear to click.
